version: "3"
services:
  webapp:
    image: lifeosai/ecommerce_chatbot:latest
    ports:
      - "8001:8000"
    depends_on:
      - api
    environment:
      DATABASE_URL: postgres://lifeos-neo@localhost:5432/lightweightassistant?sslmode=require&applicationIntent=high

    build: .
    command: npm start
    ports:
      - "8000:8000"
    depends_on:
      - db
    environment:
      DATABASE_URL: postgres://lifeos-neo@localhost:5432/lightweightassistant?sslmode=require&applicationIntent=high
  db:
    image: neo4j:latest
